title.narrative: UNRWA/humanitarian assistance to the occupied Palestine territory

description.narrative: Humanitarian assistance to the occupied Palestine territory (West Bank and Gaza) through UNRWA (the United Nations Relief and Works Agency for Palestine Refugees in the Near East). UNRWA's 2015 OpT Emergency Appeal totals 414 million U.S. dollars. The majo rity of the needs are in Gaza where the humanitarian situation is still critical after the war in summer 2014. UNRWA needs funding especially for emergency shelter and repairs and food assistance in Gaza. There are a total of 19 million people in need of h umanitarian assistance in the OpT according to the United Nations. In Gaza nearly 90 000 homes of Palestine refugees were destroyed in the war and reconstruction has been slow to start. Nearly 800 000 Palestine refugees in Gaza and 94 000 in the West Bank require UNRWA's food assistance.
